version_description:
- Date Stamp Mode
- Viewfinder Touch Mode
- Bug fixes.

This new version includes the following updates:

- Camera
Selfie, Timer, Random Light Effects On/Off
Photo quality settings
Selfie flash

-Lab
3D Touch: preview, share, save and delete
Batch process to save and delete multiple photos

- Photo Preview
Sharing a photo by swiping up
Closing Preview by swiping down
Zoom-in by double tap
Save button

-Features
Option to keep photos within the app when Auto Save
Creating HUJI album when save in Photos
Photo quality adjustment when save
Option to preserve original photos
Geo tagging when taking photos
Date format option
New font for Date Stamp

- Minor UI Improvement
- iOS 9 support

This new version includes the following updates:

- Improvements
.Importing photos from you album:
You can now apply beautiful, gorgeous 1998-film-looking HUJI filter to your previous photos waiting in Photos app! This feature is packed in the In-App-Purchase item. No additional purchase needed If you already bought the IAP item before.
.Adds Photo Recovery Mode: Please read the app description for detail
.More Light Effects
.Support for iPhone X

- Bug Fixes
.Fixed the issue that photos were occasionally taken when starting
.Fixed Date Stamp issue appearing in the date of Japanese or Buddhist calendar

- Meet big sized HUJI Cam on your iPad.
- Bug Fixes.

Fixed the issue occurring a crash when deleting photos.
Fixed the wrong orientation of photos when importing photos.

This new version includes the following updates:

- Adds iPhone XR, iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max support.
- Adds the option to choose 'Current' date when imported from Photos.
- Changes the behavior of Light Effect to continuously on if the Random Light Effect is 'On' when importing pictures from Photos.
- Improves upon the roll film image that appears when taking pictures.
- More Beautiful Light Effects.

This new version includes the following updates :

.More Beautiful Light Effects
.Selfie flash support for iPad
.Language support and improvement in 13 countries
(If you found something unnatural in translation, please let us know)
.Bug Fixes

This new version includes the following updates:

- Adds iPhone XR, iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max support.
- Adds the option to choose 'Current' date when imported from Photos.
- Changes the behavior of Light Effect to continuously on if the Random Light Effect is 'On' when importing pictures from Photos.
- Improves upon the roll film image that appears when taking pictures.
- More Beautiful Light Effects.
